Week 1

Week 1: Introduction

Welcome back and welcome to Instrumental Analysis!

To Do:

  1. Log into the MS Teams site.
  2. Review the syllabus and schedule, and complete the syllabus quiz (at end of Intro video).
  3. Watch all the 1.X.X videos and complete the end-of-video quizzes (found in MS Teams).
  4. Watch A Long Shot that Paid Off by CSIRO.
  5. (Lab) Complete exercises 1.1, 1.2, and 1.3 in Chapter 1 of the Lab Manual).
  6. (Lab) Attend the safety lecture during your designated time (remember your mask!).

There is no lecture meeting this week.
